General.Name: Quirin Privatbank AG
General.Description: Quirin Privatbank AG engages in banking and capital markets businesses in Germany. It offers support and advisory services for private customers; and support and advisory services to companies for planning and implementation of equity and debt capital financing. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Berlin, Germany.

1.Name: Mr. Johannes  Eismann
1.Title: CFO, Board Member of Capital Markets & Member of Management Board
